website_summaries.verdict: On-the-go buyers will appreciate this cup's remarkable efficiency and portability.
pros: Extremely portable – can easily fold up and fit in a handbag or pocket
Impressive price tag for the exceptional value
cons: Smaller opening than a few buyers were expecting
May feel flimsy when you pick up the drink

customer_reviews.title: Although on the Amazon site in questions these are said ...
customer_reviews.text: Although on the Amazon site in questions these are said to be made in the USA, when I received them the box is clearly marked: Made in China. I would not have ordered glasses made in China.
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best. Purchase. Ever. If you've ever found yourself trying to enjoy an evening glass of wine but worry you may drop ANOTHER one of sweet Grandma's antique wine glasses, because you are too busy cooking up something to eat, with a baby on your hip, while watching a toddler ride his bike, as your hubs chats with the neighbors, then worry no more. These glasses are the best! Easy to handle. East to sip. Easy to clean. Easy living, indeed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Camille

customer_reviews.title: Nice seller too
customer_reviews.text: Sent these as a b-day gift for my sister to use around her pool. Arrived right on time and a big hit. Nice seller too. He pointed out that you can wash these and then put in the freezer while they are still wet for an ice cold glass. :)
customer_reviews.author: roseann8628

customer_reviews.title: Flexible fun for your favorite beverage!
customer_reviews.text: These have to be some of the most flexible, squishiest glasses I've ever used - and I LOVE them! I wanted something unbreakable, I got something unbreakable! Once you get a feel for them, they're great. Initially, I tried to hold it like a stemless wine glass, but it was way too soft for that. I quickly discovered that holding it in a way that gently squeezed the top provided a perfectly shaped opening for sipping my favorite beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Druid47

customer_reviews.title: we love them. used them for a gathering at the ...
customer_reviews.text: we love them. used them for a gathering at the winery last weekend and they were perfect to carry around outside and inside. We were not worried about dropping and breaking them at all. Everyone needs these for their wine tasting parties or any outdoor events!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love these....
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! We use them primarily when we sit outside on our deck. Especially good to use when there are kids and dogs running around. We also use them when tailgating. Received them quickly and will definitely buy from vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Marygio

customer_reviews.title: Fits anywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: So far love them. Yes, they are a bit weird....kind of like the inside of a ball or something...BUT I think they are going to be perfect for our trailer. Plastic works, but they get tossed all over during travel. These should stay put better and won't hurt when I open the cupboard, if they fall out. Plus so good for our 4 year old grandson. I like the odd shape...just looks more special for a "glass" of wine than the typical hard plastic. I also am looking forward to stuffing them somewhere...like a pocket...for hikes. We'll be using them a lot, in the future, during our travels with our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanied

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift to my wine-loving best friend and she loves them! I took them out to see for myself before I gave them to her and thought they were great. I thought the bottoms might be a little harder silicone but they will be great for what you use them for. My friend has a cabin and is going to keep two there and two at home. Perfect if you have kids or dogs around that may knock them over at some point. No glass to clean up if a spill occurs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these. The drink stays cool and the "glasses" ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. The drink stays cool and the "glasses" are sturdy (don't have to worry about them toppling over or anything). I'm planning on giving a few sets of these as gifts this Christmas; it would be great to sip wine by the pool without worrying about a regular wine glass falling over and leaving shards of glass underfoot!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea! This was a gift for friends who camp. Wish they were glow in the dark so it would be even more cool! Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun produce - useful for when I want to go to the pool and can't have any glass containers, plus the squishy-ness never quite gets old. They do have a funny smell to them, which is my only reason for the docked star. I'm not sure if I left them out on a shelf if the smell would dissipate, but if you store them in the box like I do, prepare for a slightly chemically odor. Depending on what you're drinking this may determine how much they get used, as I'm not the biggest fan of a strong odor with my white wine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My go-to drink vessel in every room and outside too!
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin...? I love these!!! ...portable, can be packed in any small space in our RV and can even help cushion other dishware. I like their slightly larger size so they can hold other drinks or beverages. Heaven forbid I drop that glass of wine, but at least I won’t have to clean up all the glass shards! My husband uses them as his cereal bowls! Also great for bathroom toothbrush! If you hold it just so, it makes its own pour spout! I’m gonna need another set for the patio...!
customer_reviews.author: dray

customer_reviews.title: Great product and business!
customer_reviews.text: These are well-made and super practical. They are the perfect size. And I love that they are produced by a one-man shop! The seller has reached out twice and seems to sincerely care about the product and customer feedback. Happy to support a micro business!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Marques

customer_reviews.title: If your thinking about buying them, DO IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my wine glasses, I purchased the 14 ounce glasses the size is exactly what I needed. I will be using them mostly for backpacking and camping, they are durable, lightweight, and VERY well made. I’m extremely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mallory deemer

customer_reviews.title: Great cups for outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: Okay so these wine glasses are great, we live in Hawaii and 99% of beaches are no glass so these worked perfectly for all my wine going activities on the beach and were a fun little toy for my friends baby to play with in the sand. I’m giving it one less star because while wine works really good one of my cups was stained yellow from soda being put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: After breaking 3 wine glasses in one evening, we decided to give these a try. These are indestructible. Unbeatable for camping and portable uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Zunderman

customer_reviews.title: Pool safe, dog proof! Pour that wine!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these glasses during a recent visit with my daughter & "grand-dogs". Although generally well-behaved, accidents will happen when we're excited to be together again - and those happy tails have minds of their own! I enjoy pool-side wine sipping (and I have 3 dogs of my own!) so shatter-proof, spill-resistant glasses are a MUST! These ALSO collapse for portability!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Wing

customer_reviews.title: I just used them last night and they are great! At first it was a little weird to ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used them last night and they are great! At first it was a little weird to get used to drinking out of them but once you are used to them they are great! I have 2 small kids and they are always climbing on me so that's why I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tipsy.
customer_reviews.text: We just recently bought these glasses after knowing some friends who had similar ones for their sailboat. I purchased these for camping in our offroad trailer. They are great and you definitely don't have to worry about breaking them. The one thing I noticed was the flat base was a bit small. If you use these on anything but a level surface they have a tendancy to tip over. If you are making the opening larger, maybe make the base a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Paul David Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Put them in the dishwasher when they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Put them in the dishwasher when they arrived and used one when I got home from work! Great for outside and inside with our dog's tails that seem to knock everything off the coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Need to turn your wrist 90 degrees to drink. Cool!
customer_reviews.text: They are a great idea. There’s one querk that I immediately discovered. Drinking from them requires u to turn your wrist around so that the collapsed sides from holding the glass point east and west on your hand otherwise your nose hits the collapsed lip from the normal holding of a glass. No big deal. You feel “cool” from the holding of the glass the new way, I think. I like it and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Smaller opening "white wine" version glasses
customer_reviews.text: I have existing silicone wine glasses but they have a much bigger mouth opening on them (look like they are for red wine), and as a result are quite easy to collapse, fumble & spill. THESE are exactly what I was looking for!! They are the "white" wine version and are easier to handle overall. I was tickled to find these! The box arrived yesterday, they are already washed and tucked in our RV to use this weekend!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Not Pure Silicone??
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they weren't as expensive as other choices. Turns out it's because they're cheaply made. The silicone is so thin it crushes in my hand when I try to drink from it, making it nearly impossible to drink. I'm not even sure they're made from pure silicone. I read online that you can test silicone purity by pinching and twisting it and if it changes color, it's not pure. Well, I tried it and it doesn't look like pure silicone, so who knows what it is?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be precarious
customer_reviews.text: First of all the "clear" glasses are translucent. No big deal, but they aren't clear. I think they're kind of cool and want to like them, but can't help thinking their users had better be very conscious of how soft they are and pick them up very gingerly. I had to treat mine gingerly picking it up with seltzer water in it; I can just picture someone absently picking one up with a second glass of wine in it and splashing the contents all over the place. I think a great improvement to these might be any stiffening that could be added.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office gift exchange!
customer_reviews.text: The were a hot item at the office Christmas Party Gift Exchange! People were excited about the idea of using them at their pool, at outdoor concert venues with a no glass container policy, even the idea of using them at the beach came up! I believe two people at the party logged into Amazon and bought them after the gift exchange ended. I will definitely be buying a set for my own use too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are unique to say the least. We had a friend over last night and even though he doesn't drink wine, he poured his entire beer in one of the glasses and it accommodated every drop. He even picked it up and drank from it without spilling a drop. I gave him the glass. If I do that much, I will have to purchase more. Hahaha.. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea, But Product Has Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Nice Idea but the product has flaws. The base is way too narrow making them prone to tipping, the opening is also too small, and the material is too squishy. I was also hoping the color would be more transparent. If these items are addressed it will be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello Dan, We recently went to concert out of town with friends and they brought one of your glasses with them for me to use. I loved it so much I ran to our room and got on my computer and ordered them right away!! They are absolutely perfect for outdoors , poolside, beach etc... just perfect I think sets of bright colors would be fun but don't change anything! They are great!!! Gretchen Nelson 8/21/18
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen N

customer_reviews.title: Love the glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses , perfect size, and wonderful idea, these are a Christmas present so I have not used them as of yet, however I have a feeling the rest of the family will want these
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking!
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a hiking trip and they worked nicely! Firm enough to not spill the contents but squishy enough to pack well. I think they need a container to carry them in that compresses them to make room in hiking/camping back packs. I put them in a plastic baggie and pressed the air out before sealing. They opened the baggie and didn’t allow for sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Talyr

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love how durable and easy to store these are. they are perfect for my dorm room! the one gripe I have with them is that the silicone material attracts dust and hair so I feel like I have to rinse these out right before I use them every time. these are still great though and definitely were a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Have't used the product yet, however, it came as described. Nice quality, thick material and waiting to be washed for use. I do wish it came with cleaning instructions, I have no idea if dishwasher safe. Also NOT clear, they are white. I'm concerned about staining when drinking red wine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Them...
customer_reviews.text: ...but I wish they came with instructions for cleaning them. We were not sure what to do, and so we put them in the dishwasher. Also, is there a way to get the smell out of the glasses so the wine doesn't absorb the smell?
customer_reviews.author: LRose

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother. Great idea, but doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too mushy. Hard to feel confident when you pick them up to drink. We ended up just sending them to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Two went in our camping gear and two went in our travel gear. these will be great in our travel day bags for when we want to enjoy a pint or bottle of wine in a park someplace.
customer_reviews.author: egcaki

customer_reviews.title: Drink safely with silicone
customer_reviews.text: We already had a pair of similar, but more translucent, silicone wine glasses that my husband received for Christmas. We really like them, so wanted more for when guest come over. With our original set, as well as our new Brovinos, we find that they are narrow at the rim. Fortunately, the silicone is flexible, one can squeeze a bit to drink happily. Perfect for entertaining and a safer choice than glass around pets and children. We're giving them as Father's Day gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabet Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Brought them to the pool. Whether you’re using for wine or for water..they’re great. My kids used them as water glasses. Was much nicer than plastic cups that blow around when they’re empty. I number them on the bottom with a sharpie so my kids know which one is theirs (can get confusing with lots of kids and they’re in and out of the pool constantly). So it less waste too:)
customer_reviews.author: Pcmkn

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a raffle basket for a fundraising event. Were a great addition to the 'adult themed' basket!
customer_reviews.author: Duraye Marshelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my friend with an RV. She really liked the glasses. It is a good concept for camping life.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks excellent, and quick seller delivery
customer_reviews.text: Giving these as a gift, but they look like excellent quality, and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool side
customer_reviews.text: The glasses came next day which is always great. The kids love to sit by the pool with their drinks but usually drop them. The heavy plastic cups break and glass shatters so these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maritsa Yzaguirre-Kelley

customer_reviews.title: perfect for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I liked these a lot for enjoying wine outside on the patio or roof, since they are of course unbreakable. They're a little weird to drink from and take a minute to get used to (pro tip: squeeze it a bit before you sip). Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great product not just for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I did not purchase these for drinks.I just needed a flexible container so I can squeeze it under the oil filter on my airplane when doing oil changes to prevent spilling the oil inside my cowling, I couldn’t fit any other container in that very tight space and these work great for that purpose cause they’re flexible. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect. They are the perfect size and even fit ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. They are the perfect size and even fit in your pocket. Love these for many occasions. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My mom and I loved them! I got them as a Mother’s Day present as we always seem to break wine glasses in the sink and dishwasher because the stems and glass is thin. These are great. And they don’t stain with red wine! I was a little worried about them being easier to tip over/spill, but I was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy they are!
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Pliable and narrow opening, BUT THEY WON'T BREAK!!
customer_reviews.text: While I love that I can take these on outdoor camping trips or that I can shove these into the RV and not worry about them breaking on a bumpy road, I don't like how soft they feel when held. They give just a bit too much for my liking. It would be wonderful, if they could be a bit more sturdy while holding them. Also, the opening is a bit small, where my nose (which isn't particularly big. lol) is hitting the upper rim.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Small

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced but workable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works as described. The main thing that's unexpected was how unbalanced the glasses are. They have to be almost half filled (or half empty depending on your philosophical view) so that the slightest bump doesn't tip the glass over.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are great. Just a lil flimsy but not bad once you get used to them... my kids think they are so cool And drink their juice from them. They do sweat like any other glass, but they don't break when dropped!!!!! I prefer them now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey  sage Garcia

customer_reviews.title: and must say I was very pleased. They are just the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just received these Silicone Wine Glasses, and must say I was very pleased. They are just the perfect size. I will say the first drink takes a little getting used to, but once you get the hang of it, they're great! I highly recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and definitely good for around the pool
customer_reviews.text: A bit less solid than I anticipated. If you squeeze them you certainly will spill them but do hold their shape and gold wine well.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hiking, travel, and outdoor theater. You can fit one in the other for tight packing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These cups are perfect for a picnic, no need to worry about breaking. Clean up is very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: These wine glasses won't break.
customer_reviews.text: We have a pool and our grandchildren visit often. Guests visit and parties are frequent. I don't want anyone getting cut from broken glass. No worries with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Silicon Wine glasses thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool. I bought for a Xmas gift for a friend. Can’t wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: A'smom

customer_reviews.title: Great Shatter Proof Wine “Glasses”
customer_reviews.text: These wine “glasses” seem like exactly what I needed. I haven’t used them yet—I actually purchased them as a gift for a friend, but they are definitely not going to shatter when one of us inevitably drops one after a girls’ night! So far they seem great! The silicone is durable but pliable, so they’d be easy to pack for a picnic or concert too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Poor follow through
customer_reviews.text: These sounded so great but they end up trying to collapse while u are using them. Maybe the heat from ur hand makes them softer???
customer_reviews.author: Sanya

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item today in the mail and like other reviews said, the cups have a odd smell to them even after you wash them but it’s silicone and will probably go away overtime. They’re very durable and holds any drinks just fine. I’d definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but very soft
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for use in our spa. Everybody at our house loves them. The only down side is with their softness, they can be unstable when drinking from them. Great glasses
customer_reviews.author: Tif E.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a photographer and I bought these because I like to bring champagne to my clients engagement sessions
customer_reviews.text: I'm a photographer and I bought these because I like to bring champagne to my clients engagement sessions. I usually am lugging around camera equipment and other things and these are super durable so I can stuff them anywhere without having to worry about anything breaking. My photo sessions are usually outdoors so these "glasses" are great for that as well. My clients think they are pretty neat too! Great product and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Makes a perfect dirty Santa/white elephant gift or gift for a wine lover paired with a bottle of wine. I bought this as a gift, but will be buying myself a set as well because I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anytime really but we find them helpful in our Jacuzzi spa. No worries of glass breaking and much fancier than the kids plastic cups 😜. It’s nice to have four to share with guests!
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Not good to drink out of
customer_reviews.text: These were awkward to drink from and had a silicone taste ever after the glasses were washed. Buy plastic. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Csw

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cups!
customer_reviews.text: Coolest glasses ever! Comes in a nice box and made for a great Christmas present to my sis-in-law. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outside or inside entertaining! I always break my glasses and that is not possible with these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: They look good
customer_reviews.text: but they would be better if they were more harder because they lose a bit of shape when picked up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I ordered 1 set and then turned around and ordered another. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are prefect for camping trips, don’t have to worry about breaking a glass.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: These worked well for our "ladies night" by the pool ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for our "ladies night" by the pool. I got them for my friend, and she continues to use them on a regular basis. They were shipped efficiently, and came as described. No silicone taste when drinking out of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone with pets or small kids
customer_reviews.text: These take a licking and keep on ticking. Initially they have a weird powder on them but after a run through the dishwasher, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rfrey2717

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my mom - she loves them! Easy to use, clean, and portable to take anywhere. Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hard to hold
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to hold as sides are not at all rigid. Fold in and awkward to grasp
customer_reviews.author: bjmwriter

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, durable
customer_reviews.text: Kinda different at first...almost squishy. However, perfect size, durable, not breakable. Perfect for sipping wine poolside or by the campfire!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Grooms

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: These are more sturdy and impacted than I thought. They are awesome. Will definitely be buying more for my friends and family! And it has a cute little paragraph on the back by the owner and it literally makes me want to buy more products from him!
customer_reviews.author: Missy G

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: The cups are virtually indestructible which is great for anyone who has kids, pets, or butter fingers. It takes some getting used to because they are flexible but I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie March

customer_reviews.title: A HIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took these to a White Elephant Christmas party and everyone fought over them. A lot of them had pools and wanted them when they drink at the pool. So thank you for your product! Were a huge hit at the party!
customer_reviews.author: jilbry2

customer_reviews.title: She was super excited and we used them the same day
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my mom. She has been wanting some after using them at a friends by the pool! She was super excited and we used them the same day. The mouth opening could be a little bit bigger, but other than that, they are great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cups that do the trick...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, they work great! The only issue I had was that the chemical smell was a bit strong at first. I recommend washing them several times thoroughly before using.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G

customer_reviews.title: Caution: spills likely
customer_reviews.text: Kids and spouse were not impressed. Collapses in hand easily and tips over. Love the travel ability but the practicality diminished the charm.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they'll be fine..
customer_reviews.text: Being "squishy" they take a little getting used to. Haven't used them for wine yet (bought them to pack on a hiking trip to France this summer) but have been trying then it with water. I'm sure they'll be fine... Great for our wants/needs of packability on our hike.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Love my new silicone wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new silicone wine glasses! Great for pool or beach. I keep them in freezer. They are quite sturdy. The only suggestion I would make is that they are clearer in color. I only had carry on luggage and was able to squeeze these glasses in easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: These are a great wine glass option for traveling!! My husband and I always take a bottle of wine to our hotel and these glasses are the best...pack easily, don't take up extra room since they "fold", and won't break! A pleasant change from the plastic hotel glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These were super flimsy; like your drink will spill if you grip the glass too tightly. We have another brand of silicone drink ware that is much sturdier (get what you pay for I guess). We returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Thick and durable silicone wine glasses, perfect for putting in a backpack or taking camping. Held up nicely in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan M Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: I like them! They are fun and squishy and most of all transportable. This wouldn't be my go-to glass at home, but definitely would use for on the go and around the pool! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE E BIANCO

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take camping. They work well if you don’t add a lot of liquid. They are not easy to drink from once you add liquids. They are flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Elvia Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Silicone smell
customer_reviews.text: Silicone/rubber smell is too strong to drink wine in. No aroma felt.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: We are thinking they will work great pool-side and that we can decorate them in an ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses at my daughters's suggestions for gifts. We are thinking they will work great pool-side and that we can decorate them in an appropriate manner. They look to be durable and a generous size.

customer_reviews.title: It is great product
customer_reviews.text: They are the right size and lightweight for travel. My friend was so excited !

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor events and parties!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the size and feel of these silicone glasses. They were a gift and were packaged very nicely. Perfect for outdoor events. I'm actually thinking of buying some for myself because I liked them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan N.

customer_reviews.title: unbreakable! I live in a tiny house and every ...
customer_reviews.text: unbreakable! I live in a tiny house and every single wine glass I have ever own is broken! mainly cause cast iron gets thrown in the sink with the fragile glasses or my dogs tails hit it and comes crashing! NO REGRETS!!!

customer_reviews.title: Kind of fun for a glamping trip we had
customer_reviews.text: Kind of fun for a glamping trip we had. The opening are kind of small. They stand up find which was good.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - fold down really small, will be taking on a trip with us. They are a great size and super convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift idea!!
customer_reviews.text: The silicone wine glasses are quite handy in places where you can’t use glass. Durable and sturdy. Glad I bought them...

customer_reviews.title: off-gassing smell after running through dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: i can't tell yet whether i will like these. i've just run them through the dishwasher and they still have an off-gas smell. i have set them outside in the sun to see if it dissipates. if not, i will return them.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: These are a gift, so I'm not personally using them, but they are a great size and I love that they seem practically indestructible!

customer_reviews.text: Highly sought after when offered up as a Secret Santa gift. Thought of as a good option for drinking while camping, at the beach, and in the hot tub.

customer_reviews.title: Wine Glasses for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I like the wine glasses. They are not as “packable” as I had hoped. I did but a few rubber band on each one to try to compress them which did help. I’ll see how they do on my next trip in my suitcase.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just as described - perfect for taking on the boat, or enjoying on the patio...also nice that the kids can’t break them!

customer_reviews.text: Glasses arrived as expected. Good quality. I’m usintpg them for picnicing and camping and they are great for any beverage (not just wine)!

product_meta.title: Silicone Wine Glasses - Set of 4 - Unbreakable Outdoor Rubber Wine Cups: 14 oz, Clear Silicone. 100% Dishwasher Safe - Shatterproof Glass for Travel, Outdoor, Picnic, Pool, Boat, Camping
feature_bullets: PORTABLE: These Flexible Silicone Wine Glasses are perfect for Wine on the Go! Travel with them to any outdoor event such as a: BBQ, Beach, Pool, Park picnics, Camping or any weekend trip or vacation!

UNBREAKABLE: Never worry about broken glass anymore with these Shatterproof Indestructible Silicone Wine Cups. Can be used as wine glasses, party cups, whiskey tumblers, beer cups, mixed drinks and cocktails.
EASY TO CLEAN: Completely dishwasher safe & stain-proof, made from premium nonstick Clear Silicone. Making this set of 4 the perfect option for when you're hosting an outdoor event!

PERFECT WINE GIFT: These Funny Wine Glasses will serve as the ideal present for anybody who likes wine! They are the same size as a regular glass of wine, only these are Stemless Wine Glasses made of Silicone.
LIFETIME WARRANTY: We stand behind our products and it is our duty to satisfy our customers. Don't like our products? We will give you a 100% refund, no questions asked!
